Content.Text:
<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Mornin', <MYNAME>. How's your work on the
town going? You provide us townspeople
with a ray of hope.
<PAGE>
Please do your best. I'll do whatever I
can to help.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Mornin', <MYNAME>. The people in this town
are all good-hearted folks. You should
try to get to know them.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Mornin', <MYNAME>. You remind me of myself
when I was your age.
<PAGE>
I used to be full of passion back then,
just like you are now.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Howdy, <MYNAME>. If you're having any
problems, don't hesitate to tell me
about them.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Well if it isn't <MYNAME>. It's good to
see you out greeting your neighbors.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You know, <MYNAME>, from behind you look
surprisingly similar to your father.
<PAGE>
It'd be nice to see your parents again.
Now I guess I'm just talking like an old
man.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Evenin', <MYNAME>. I see you're up late
working for the town. Are you gonna be
able to call it a day soon?

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Evenin', <MYNAME>. On clear days, the
starry sky is beautiful here in this
town.
<PAGE>
In other towns, the air is polluted and
you can't see the stars as clearly.
That's why I love this town's night sky.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Evenin', <MYNAME>. Are you enjoying your
life on the farm?
<PAGE>
<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>When I see you, it's like I'm watching
your father work. Ha ha ha.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Howdy, <MYNAME>. It's a fine day today,
but this spring weather actually makes
me sleepy.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well if it isn't <MYNAME>. Are you out
working in the rain? You should take
more care with your health, you know.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Hey there, <MYNAME>. When you get to be my
age, you really feel this summer
heat.
<PAGE>
I wish it were just a little cooler...

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hi there, <MYNAME>. I hope this rain means
it will cool off a bit and make for a
more pleasant day tomorrow.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey <MYNAME>, are you takin' a walk? It'd
be nice if every day were as sunny as
today, wouldn't it?
<PAGE>
<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>Ah, never mind. What am I saying? Of
course you need rain out there on the
farm.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Working out in the rain and getting wet
like this could get you sick, <MYNAME>.
You should go home soon and warm up.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hi there, <MYNAME>. It's warm and pleasant
today, huh?
<PAGE>
<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>If spring doesn't come soon, it's going
to be rough on the body of an old guy
like me. Of course, you're still young.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well if it isn't <MYNAME>. What are you
doing out in all this snow? It'd be
safer for you to stay at home.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
This wind is mighty fierce. I just hope
the town's buildings don't blow away. Is
your farm all right, <MYNAME>?

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This snow is terrible. I just hope it
doesn't crush the town's buildings. Is
your farm all right, <MYNAME>?

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh yeah, <MYNAME>, is it true that you're
in a relationship now?
<PAGE>
I need to tell your parents. I'm sure
they'll be happy to hear it.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I've been to a lot of towns before, but
none of them had a forest like ours.
This forest is the town's treasure.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
In life you've got to be firm like this
forest. The same is true for farm work.
<PAGE>
<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>Once you make up your mind, you've got
to be determined in your work. If you do
that, you'll be sure to succeed.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This forest is full of blessings, like
mushrooms, fish from the river, and
plants.
<PAGE>
<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>The people who live in this town are
permitted to partake of these blessings
freely. Take whatever you want.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
There have been a lot of typhoons here,
but this river has never flooded or
overflowed into the town.
<PAGE>
There's a legend that says the river is
protected by the Harvest Goddess. This
river has a rich, noble history.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Just look at this mountain view, <MYNAME>.
Doesn't it make you happy that you came
to this town?

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Families used to come here to picnic and
play on the summit. Those were the days.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, this farm has been protected
by generations of your ancestors. I'm
sure it will flourish under your care.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
How are things going on the farm,
<MYNAME>?
<PAGE>
<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>Your hard work has the potential to
change this town. I'm counting on you!

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I take a lot of pictures in the mine.
Sometimes the shimmering minerals make
for a magical photo.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
There are probably a lot of jewels in
this mine. In fact, there were a lot of
miners working here when I was little.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
People have started moving to the town,
but it still feels pretty lonely.
<PAGE>
Let's both work hard to bring more
people here.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
It seems like a few more people have
come recently. It's all thanks to your
hard work, <MYNAME>. I appreciate it.
<PAGE>
<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>But we've only just begun. Let's up our
efforts and turn this town into a much
livelier place!

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This town has become much livelier. I
appreciate all effort you've put in,
<MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>Let's keep up the good work and make
this town even better. I can't wait to
see what lies ahead.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Everyone's very grateful to you for
turning this town into such a wonderful
place.
<PAGE>
And I'm finally satisfied with the job
we've done. Let's keep things this good
going forward.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
How are you liking the town, <MYNAME>?
Everyone's happy to have a youngster
like you here.
<PAGE>
<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>We need young people like you to
revitalize this town. I have confidence
in you, so please do your best.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I've always liked movies, and I've
watched just about every movie there is.
Movies are great, huh?
<PAGE>
<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>They can show you what different
people's lives are like. If you haven't
already, you should check one out.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I've never been able to just work in one
place, so I've worked in more towns than
I can count.
<PAGE>
<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>But I felt like there was something that
I needed to do here in this town, so I
decided to come back.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I think of everyone in this town as my
family. That includes you, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>So many people have left this town, and
each time I felt like I was losing a
part of myself.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Listen here, <MYNAME>. Life is long. Don't
get discouraged by a single failure.
<PAGE>
Everybody makes mistakes. You'll succeed
if you keep thinking about the happiness
that lies ahead.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
... My family used to live here a long
time ago, but my selfish lifestyle drove
them out.
<PAGE>
<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH><MYNAME>, my advice to you is don't take
the people who're important to you for
granted. I learned that lesson too late.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I know better than anyone how hard
you've been working, <MYNAME>. You're this
town's savior.
<PAGE>
Since your arrival here, the faces of
the townspeople have become more
cheerful, and I know it's thanks to you.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Is this corn stew? I love this stuff
more than anything!
<PAGE>
Ahhh, it smells wonderful. I really
appreciate this.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh, thank you! This is a fantastic gift.
<PAGE>
I'm impressed by how thoughtful you are,
<MYNAME>.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Thank you, <MYNAME>. This is a good gift
for me. I will gratefully accept it.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Thank you, <MYNAME>. I appreciate your
thoughtfulness.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
I appreciate the sentiment, but... um,
oh, never mind. Thanks.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
What's the meaning of this? Why are you
giving me something that I hate?
<PAGE>
This is terrible. I guess at least I
know how you feel about me now.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
In my many years on this earth, fish pie
is the thing that I have grown to hate
more than anything.
<PAGE>
Why would anyone think to put fish in a
pie? It's senseless. Couldn't you have
prepared this some other way?!

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Did you grow this on your farm? Wow,
it sure is impressive. It looks like the
farm is doing just fine.
<PAGE>
Thank you for this. I'll gladly accept
it.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
As a resident of this town, I'm happy to
see that your farm is capable of
producing such enormous crops.
<PAGE>
Thank you for this. I'll gladly accept
it.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm sorry, but I can't take this now.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
What are you doing? You just gave me
something, ya know. Why don't you try
giving that to someone else?

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Thanks, <MYNAME>. I wasn't expecting
you to celebrate my birthday.
<PAGE>
Oh my, it's sumptuous corn stew. I
didn't think I'd be eating this on my
birthday. Today is gonna be a great day.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Is this for my birthday? Thank you,
<MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
This is a very good gift. I'm not sure I
deserve it, but this is very thoughtful
of you. I'm grateful.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
A birthday present? I'm glad you
remembered my birthday.
<PAGE>
And I can't believe you gave me
something so nice. Thanks, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A birthday present for me? Why thank
you, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Thanks, <MYNAME>. But this birthday
present... No, never mind, it's the
thought that counts after all.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
This is not the kind of thing to give as
a birthday present. You need to put more
thought into these things.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Did you think that fish pie would make a
good birthday present for me? Because if
you did, you were dead wrong.
<PAGE>
Now listen here, there's nothing that I
hate more than fish pie. You've really
let me down.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I didn't think I'd have the opportunity
to see the fruits of your labor on my
birthday.
<PAGE>
<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>Thank you, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's good to see that you can grow
things this big on your farm now,
<MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>This is a good birthday present. Thank
you.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
This chick is fluffy and cute. One day
she'll help support this farm, so take
good care of her.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
You've raised this chicken well. She's
going to help support this farm in the
future, so take good care of her.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Whooee. This chicken is big. She's going
to help support this farm in the future,
so take good care of her.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
This dog may be small, but you can see
strength in those eyes. Give the little
guy the proper care farm members need.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
This dog's a bit too fat. But the little
guy is a member of your farm after all,
so I think a diet is in order.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
This dog's big and looks perfect for
helping on the farm. Give the little guy
the proper care farm members deserve.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
This dog's so fat that lifting the
little guy would be hard. I think a
diet is in order for this farm member.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Haha, what a friendly cat. Give the
little guy the proper care a member of
your farm deserves.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Come on now, just because this cat's
cute doesn't mean it's okay to be this
fat. I think a diet is in order.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
What a wonderful coat of fur. This cat
is also a member of your farm, so treat
the little guy right.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
You've been feeding this cat too much.
I think it's time to put this member of
your farm on a diet.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Are you sure you want to give this to
me? I'm sure there's someone else who
you'd be better off giving it to.
<PAGE>
<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>Well, if you're sure you want to give it
to me, I'll gratefully accept it.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
A Pumpkin Festival present for me? Come
on now, you know how old I am.
<PAGE>
<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>Still, receiving this actually feels
pretty good. Thank you, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Oh, that brings back memories. A long
time ago, I also used a blue feather to
ask someone to marry me.
<PAGE>
<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>Now that feather only serves to remind
me of the past. Sigh...

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Oh, that brings back memories. A long
time ago, I also used a ring to ask
someone to go out with me.
<PAGE>
Now that ring only serves to remind
me of the past. Sigh...

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I don't think it's good to carry a wild
bird around with you like that. You
should let it go.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I don't think it's good to carry a wild
animal around with you like that. You
should let it go.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I don't think it's good to carry a wild
turtle around with you like that. You
should let it go.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Keep up the good work, <MYNAME>. Oh,
that's right. Isn't today your birthday?
Here, let me give you a present.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>, it's your birthday today, right?
Congratulations. You're one step closer
to becoming an adult.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's been a while, hasn't it? How have
you been? I'm always wondering about how
your work on the farm and town is going.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hi there, <MYNAME>. You should relax and
enjoy these pictures.

Zzz... Have to... grow... the town...
<MYNAME>... zzz... zzz

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm eating right now. Sorry, but can
you come back later?

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I like this green bench. Green is one of
my favorite colors. You've got some
pretty good taste.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Don't you think that this silver bench
looks luxurious?
<PAGE>
... No, the fact that it's not gold is
what makes it look luxurious... Do you
get what I'm saying?

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Are you going to build something with
this stack of bricks?
<PAGE>
No? I see. You're just giving the place
some atmosphere, aye?

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
There's something that I like about this
old cart.
<PAGE>
It's a good decoration for the town.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
This is a nice table.  It looks like a
good place for everyone to get together
and have fun when we have the time.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Can I sit in this chair?
<PAGE>
I'm glad that you put this here for
relaxing. I'm sure I'll be using it
again.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This parasol table looks like the type
of place where you'd have tea after a
stroll through the garden.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Street lights make me feel safer at
night. This might surprise you, but I
don't like dark places.
<PAGE>
With street lights like this in the
town, I can go for walks after dark
without worrying.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
When this beacon is lit, I feel safer
when I go for walks at night.
<PAGE>
Of course, I feel a little uneasy when
the wind blows.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That's quite a large totem pole. It's
impressive, but what in the world is it
for?
<PAGE>
It'd be a shame just to use it as a
decoration. We should think of an event
to use it in.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This dog statue is of some kind of
heroic dog, right? I can't say I really
know much about it...

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This fountain with water coming out
of the bird's beak is pretty
interesting.
<PAGE>
And it's nice and compact, so it doesn't
take up much space. I think it's just
perfect for a small park.

This is a normal fountain, but that
curtain of water in the middle looks
like it's nice and cool.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I like this arched bridge. It's got an
exotic feeling to it.
<PAGE>
It'd be even better if the pond beneath
it were a little bigger.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'd like to ride on this minecart and go
somewhere far away, but there's no
track, so I guess that's impossible.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What exactly are you supposed to watch
from this watchtower?

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This is a nice hammock hanging here.
Sleeping in a hammock can be a little
tricky.
<PAGE>
Techniques vary depending on the type of
hammock, but it's always important to
trust nature and give in to gravity.
<PAGE>
You can't move your body forcefully.
You've got to let your body sink
naturally into the hammock.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That's a wonderful obelisk. I don't know
where you got it from, but it's quite
impressive.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
There's a big stone marker here, but I
have no idea what's written on it.
<PAGE>
Still, the fact that it's mysterious
makes it interesting.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This is an interesting vehicle. Is it
for children?
<PAGE>
<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>You ride on it? Oh... I see. Well, It
looks fun.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A mechanical lion, huh?
<PAGE>
<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>You ride on it? Oh... I see. Well, It
looks fun.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A mechanical panda, huh?
<PAGE>
<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>You ride on it? Oh... I see. Well, It
looks fun.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I remember this robot from TV.
<PAGE>
This full-scale model is very big and
impressive.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
This area is very nice. It has a sense
of balance.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I like the atmosphere here. The
decorations are very nice.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
This is a relaxing place. It reminds me
of a nice park.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Walking down tree-lined paths is always
pleasant.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I like tree-lined paths. Seeing large
trees makes me feel relaxed and calm.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I can walk down the tree-lined path
whenever I want to thanks to its benches
and street lights. What a great town.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
This garden is nice and cozy. I'm sure
it will improve the atmosphere of the
town.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I like this garden. You can sit down on
a bench and relax and enjoy the plants.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
What a luxurious garden. It's sure to
attract everyone in the town.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Does saying I like bonsai make me sound
like an old man?
<PAGE>
I can't help it. I feel like I'm delving
into another world. I could look at this
forever.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I like topiaries, but it's not very
often that you see one with two balls.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This hedge is beautifully trimmed. It
must have been done by a skilled
gardener.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Cherry blossoms make spring more
festive. Of course, we'll all have to
come out together to enjoy the flowers.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
This red flower arch is beautiful. I can
see... red roses... and magic red
flowers.
<PAGE>
Don't you think having a tunnel made of
flower arches would be wonderful?

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
If you're going to build a fence, a
green one is the only way to go.
You've got good taste, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh yeah, <MYNAME>. Let me give you this
to you as an expression of my gratitude.
I'm sure it'll come in handy.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh yeah, <MYNAME>. Let me give you this
to you as an expression of my gratitude.
I'm sure it'll come in handy.
Now's not a good time to give a present.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hair salons don't really suit me, but I
guess even I should try to look good
sometimes.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's good to go to the tailor's
once in a while. Wearing the same
clothes all year is boring.
<PAGE>
But still, I feel like these clothes
suit me best.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
For someone like me, it's good to have
a restaurant where you can relax and
eat.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You know there's a travel agency in this
town? Do you use it much, <MYNAME>?
<PAGE>
Well, travelling is great. You should go
see many different places while you're
still young.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Tea houses are the perfect place to take
a little break.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I've been to a lot of different places,
so I'm used to moving. But I think I'm
about ready to settle down in one place.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
It's good that the town is expanding.
That means more people and more shops.
How wonderful!

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It looks like there are a lot of Western
buildings here. I like it. I think they
suit this town and make it feel orderly.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
